title: Flat Model (Flaches Modell)
provenance:
Estate of Magda Mautner
Commissioned by Hertha Jaeger, member of the family of Magda Mautner von Markhof
description: Flat, rectangular in form; handle tapers very slightly towards base of blade; blade straight with curved end; four hollow beads attached to bottom edge of handle.
name: Knife
